alert.note: Alert for Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 1:01PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Chicot, northern Ashley and Washington Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 101 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dermott, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mcmillan Corner around 110 PM CDT. Winterville around 135 PM CDT. Greenville and Metcalfe around 140 PM CDT. Leland around 145 PM CDT. Tribbett around 155 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Blanchton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for northwestern Mississippi.
